vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision every Filipino family to have food on the table.

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.description: We build partnerships and capacity for community resilience and self-reliance.

values.heading: Our Values
values.description: Our work in Jollibee Group Foundation is inspired by the same values that have successfully guided the Jollibee Group since its inception. Speed with excellence and integrity are the foundations of our endeavors. Customer focus, humility to listen and learn, and embracing the spirit of family and fun remain at the core of our relationship with stakeholders, partners, communities, and our nation.
